sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-button type="primary" @click="add(props)" class="box-card1">添加</el-button>
  <el-card class="box-card">

  </el-card>
  
</template>
<script>
import { get } from '@/utils/request'
import { ElMessage } from 'element-plus'
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      currentPage: 1, //默认页码为1
      pagesize: 6, //默认一页显示10条
      dialogVisible: false,
      dialogVisible1: false,
      info: {}, //修改数据
      info1: {}, //新增数据
      tableData: []
    }
  },
  //初始化工作
  mounted() {
    get('/getPage').then((res) => {
      this.tableData = res.data
      console.log(res)
    })
  },

  methods: {
    handleSizeChange: function (size) {
      //一页显示多少条

      this.pagesize = size
    },

    handleCurrentChange: function (currentPage) {
      //页码更改方法

      this.currentPage = currentPage
    },
    handleClick(data) {
      this.info = data.row
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible
    },
    del(data) {
      get('/deleteCarousel', { Id: data.row.id }).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '删除成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    },
    //修改
    edit() {
      console.log('===========')
      console.log(this.info)
      this.dialogVisible = !this.dialogVisible //马上消失
      get('/updateCarousel', this.info).then((res) => {
        ElMessage({
          message: '修改成功！',
          type: 'success'
        })
        window.location.reload()
      })
    },

    add() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
    },

    insert() {
      this.dialogVisible1 = !this.dialogVisible1
      get('/addCarousel', this.info1).then((res) => {
        console.log(res)
        if (res.data == 1) {
          ElMessage({
            message: '添加成功',
            type: 'success'
          })
          // 刷新
          window.location.reload()
        } else {
          ElMessage({
            message: '添加失败',
            type: 'danger'
          })
        }
      })
    },
    tuijina(row) {
      console.log("============================")
      console.log(row.row.id)
      get('/updateRecommend2', {
        docId: row.row.id,
        recommend: row.row.recommend
      })
      ElMessage({
        message: '修改成功',
        type: 'success'
      })
      window.location.reload()
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.box-card {
  margin-top: 5px;
  margin-left: 15px;
  margin-right: 15px;
}
.box-card1 {
  margin-top: 5px;
  margin-left: 15px;
}
</style>
